Text:
Thanks very much for the great upload.

FYI to d-loaders about the video:  Although this looks very interesting (it's Ken Burns!), don't expect to be blown away by the footage (i.e. 'Planet Earth') as this is a historical account, and much of the footage is old--not newly shot breathtaking landscapes.  Just so ya know.
Thank you sooooo much for sharing this!  I'm so very passionate about the US National Parks.  I will probably be buying this once I have the spare funds.
